contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 2, 1975 D Watford (Championship Section)
LHCBBA Watford Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest LHCBBA Watford Contest watford-championship-section
Watford Colosseum, Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK 9th Annual Contest
Adjudicators: Programme has printed David Read: Open and Second Sections, Cyril Suckling: Third and Youth Sections. However, this is crossed out by hand, and substituted is David Read: Open, Third, and Youth Sections, Cyril Suckling: Second Section.
Aug. 17, 2012, 3:38 p.m. Nov. 29, 2020, 11:10 a.m.
1 Foresters Brass Edward Massey
2 Aveley Band Cyril Suckling
3 Oxford Concert Brass Cliff Edmunds Le Roi d'Ys
Unknown Result Tadley Band Gordon Saunders
Unknown Result John Dickinson (Apsley) Band Clifford Jones
Unknown Result Portsmouth City Geoffrey Mason
Unknown Result Soham Comrades Band Peter Mott Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer]
Unknown Result Cawston Band J. F. W. Royston Rhapsody in Brass

Withdrawn Southampton Central William Buchan
Withdrawn Wimborne Band Stan Willis
